commands.name: name
commands.description: Set the name of the magic item. Not necessary if you created a new one with newitem.

commands.name: descr
commands.description: Not necessary as most magic items donâ€™t have descriptions.

commands.name: spr
commands.description: Sets the sprite for the magic item. It should be centered in a 32x32 or 64x64 pixel large image. The drawn item should not be larger than 40x40 pixels however so if put in a 64x64 image it should be surrounded by black.

commands.name: rarity
commands.description: Sets how easy it should be to find this item. 0=common 1=rare 2=rare & unique 3=impossible to find as a random item. Default is 0.

commands.name: type
commands.description: Sets the magic item type. Default is 7 = misc item. See table Magic Item Types

commands.name: copyspr
commands.description: Uses the sprite from this magic item.

commands.name: copystats
commands.description: Copies all stats except the name from this magic item.

commands.name: newitem
commands.description: This command creates a new magic item.

commands.name: selectitem
commands.description: Selects an existing magic item for modification.
